name: Set Autocomplete
description: The autocomplete attribute specifies whether a form should have autocomplete on or off. When autocomplete is on, the browser automatically complete values based on values that the user has entered before. This script disables the autocomplete list on form inputs

name: Set User Select
description: The user-select CSS property controls whether the user can select text. This doesn't have any effect on content loaded as chrome, except in textboxes.This script force-enable the text selection

name: TopBottom Scroller
description: Script that add 2 buttons at rigth middle to scroll by scree height to top or bottom

name: Awesome Scroller
description: Script to easier scroll with a fake awesome scrollbar

name: Scroll to Top
description: Script to scroll to top with smooth scroll

name: no Delay Animation Opacity
description: Script to disable animation delay opacity

name: GH Repo Download Button
description: Script that add a button to download a github repository

name: Google background image
description: Change Google Search Engine background image every day with random wallpaper

name: Rotate 45°
description: Simple script to rotate images by 45° on each click
